Text: hello susanSusan This is Bobby Gerry writing to say hello It was fun meeting you at Downing Street this past weekend I wanted to drop you a line before I head off for the holidays and I hope you have a great Christmas I am going out to San Francisco on Wednesday to spend Christmas at Moms place and Im going to be out there through New Years as well It would be fun to do something after the busy holiday season ends Im glad you got to meet Julie Maxey the other night She and her husband Steven are really great Im starting to see more and more that energy is a SMALL world here in Houston Anyway I hope things are good with you and have a great holiday Bobby
